Financial Accounting â€” The Hybrid Method with LedgerLoom
========================================================

**Subtitle:** Stop Guessing. Start Reconciling.  
**Version:** 1.0 (compatible with LedgerLoom v0.2.0)

This workbook teaches *intro* financial accounting using a simple hybrid workflow:

1. Draft your work in Google Sheets (fast, visual).
2. Verify your work with LedgerLoom (strict, deterministic).
3. Reconcile any differences until they match (proof, not vibes).
